title: BRIEF-Gran Colombia Gold Announces Intention To Spin Off Marmato To Carry Out Proposed Expansion Of Underground Mining Operations
text:
BRIEF-Gran Colombia Gold Announces Intention To Spin Off Marmato To Carry Out Proposed Expansion Of Underground Mining Operations

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 07:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Gran Colombia Gold Announces Intention To Spin Off Marmato To Carry Out Proposed Expansion Of Underground Mining Operations Sept 16 (Reuters) - Gran Colombia Gold Corp : * GRAN COLOMBIA GOLD ANNOUNCES INTENTION TO SPIN OFF MARMATO TO CARRY OUT PROPOSED EXPANSION OF UNDERGROUND MINING OPERATIONS * GRAN COLOMBIA GOLD CORP - THROUGH SPIN OFF, GRAN COLOMBIA WILL RETAIN A MAJOR STAKE IN NEW COMPANY * GRAN COLOMBIA GOLD - TO LEVERAGE CAPITAL MARKETS TO PROVIDE FUNDING REQUIRED FOR EXPLORATION AND DEVELOPMENT OF UNDERGROUND MINING ASSETS AT MARMATO

BRIEF-Gran Colombia Gold Announces Intention To Spin Off Marmato To Carry Out Proposed Expansion Of Underground Mining Operations
description: BRIEF-Gran Colombia Gold Announces Intention To Spin Off Marmato To Carry Out Proposed Expansion Of Underground Mining Operations
